topics.title: RustChain Vision and Cultural Preservation
topics.summary: Introduction to RustChain as a foundation for trust and continuity, highlighting the accidental discovery of Michael Harper's memoir on vintage hardware. The presentation emphasizes how technology preserves cultural artifacts and creates a living computer museum of history.

topics.title: Proof of Antiquity Consensus Mechanism Design
topics.summary: Scott explains the motivation behind RustChain's proof of antiquity system that governs crypto by hardware age rather than computational power. The system creates sustainable mining by validating hardware age and longevity, with plans for NFT-based mining boosts and bounties for vintage hardware integration.

topics.title: Living Computer Museum Philosophy
topics.summary: Discussion of RustChain's mission to honor vintage computing hardware that made Bitcoin and modern computing possible. The system aims to preserve and utilize old hardware like PowerPC systems that were still running Bitcoin nodes in 2010.

topics.title: Technical Demo: Wallet and Transaction System
topics.summary: Live demonstration of RustChain's proof of concept including wallet generation, faucet functionality, and transaction processing. Scott shows the working system with Ergo API integration and limited Sophia AI capabilities, acknowledging some incomplete features due to time constraints.

topics.title: AI Governance Smart Contract Demo
topics.summary: Demonstration of Sophia AI making governance decisions on proposals with human-in-the-loop interaction. The demo shows AI vetoing an unsafe treehouse proposal despite simulated human votes, illustrating safety considerations in AI-assisted governance.

topics.title: RustChain Benefits and Closing Remarks
topics.summary: Final explanation of RustChain's advantages over traditional proof of work, emphasizing energy efficiency and democratized access. Scott introduces himself and presents this work as his ErgoHack 10 submission, combining RustChain with Ergo governance and AI bridging.
